title: Magic Mushrooms - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/13/18
itunes:title: Magic Mushrooms - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/13/18
description:
George Noory and fungi expert Paul Stamets explore his research into the health benefits from mushrooms and fungus, and how psychedelic mushrooms can help fight depression.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
